Requirements
============

Software
--------

* PEAR
* FastQC
* BWA
* VarScan
* Picard
* Samtools

Python and R libraries
----------------------

The older scripts only work in Python 2 (see execute-all.sh)

* Python 2.7 **and** 3.5 (or higher)
    * future (print_function)
    * sys
    * os
    * subprocess
    * gzip
    * re
    * math
    * random
    * biopython
    * regex
    * sqlite3
    * matplotlib
    * numpy
    * scipy
    * json
    * pandas
    * shutil
    * argparse
    * csv
* R
    * plyr
* Bash
